content: this is a fun and relatively simple pattern for a small crochet penis plushy affectionately named winston as the pattern is written he will measure about 5 inches tall once finished but you could always add additional row to the shaft if you want a longer willy this pattern is 7 pages long with lots of color photos to help along the way it is worked completely in single_crochet in the round and is a good pattern for crocheters of any skill level but you must be able to read your stitches and sew pieces together supplies needed 4mm hook worsted weight yarn darning needle polyester fiber fill 6mm safety eyes a sense of humor stuck_out_tongue i am always available for any questions you may have at crystalpickrelonetsy@yahoo com
